content:
I'm André and I'm a new member of the team here on Zulip. I wanted to share an idea with you that I think could improve our experience on the platform.

Currently, the profile features on Zulip are a bit hidden, so I thought it would be helpful to have a Profile button for quick access. With the Profile button, we would be able to easily view and manage our personal information and privacy settings. This would give us more control over our online presence and allow us to update our information as needed.
The ideia is to implement button in one of the red signalled areas in the photo, which would display our profile picture, name and status Screenshot-2023-04-01-at-14.04.10.png
And the someone would click on it, it would display the already created menu: image.png
I think a more visible and user-friendly Profile button would make things even easier for us. What do you think? Would you be interested in discussing this idea further with me?
Also I apologise if I'm sharing the ideia in the wrong place
The main way to access your own user card is via the \vdots menu next to your name in right sidebar. I think a more sensible change would be to try to make it more intuitive that one should do that.
But we are going to have the profile button in the redesigned version, right?
Yeah, I propose we should do nothing for now other than the existing redesign.
@André Morgado #22802 is our current plan for making your profile info easier to access (via a menu in the upper right).
